welcome_message_body: Welcome to Evansville, a charming city known for its beautiful riverfront, rich history, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!

terminals.description: The main terminal at Daviess County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.
